1: <mistake>@//pa</mistake> <mistake>rgya/ snying</mistake> rje 'gyur med 'dzin pa <mistake>'bras//stong</mistake> nyid snying <mistake>rje</mistake> dbyer med <mistake>pa//byang</mistake> chub sems ni mi 'pho <mistake>ba'o //mya</mistake> <mistake>dan</mistake> 'das pa bral ba'i <mistake>gzugs//'khor</mistake> ba las 'das mi
2: 'gyur <mistake>ba//de</mistake> dag sbyor ba gnyis med mchog / rtag dang chad las nges par <mistake>grol//dngos</mistake> med las <mistake>byung</mistake> mtshan nyid <mistake>phyir//gzugs</mistake> ni dngos po med pa min // dngos po las <mistake>byung</mistake> mtshan nyid <mistake>phyir//</mistake>
3: 'gyur ba med pa <mistake>dnos</mistake> po <mistake>min//dngos</mistake> po dngos med yang dag <mistake>sbyor //rdo</mistake> <mistake>rje'i</mistake> rnal 'byor gnyis <mistake>medg</mistake> <mistake>mchog /gzugs</mistake> dang gzugs min rnam par <mistake>grol//pra</mistake> phab me long la bzhin <mistake>no // gzu gs</mistake> ni
4: srid <mistake>par</mistake> mi 'ong ste // 'gyur med mya <mistake>dan</mistake> <mistake>'nas</mistake> <mistake>mi</mistake> <mistake>'gro//phan</mistake> tshun 'khyud pas zhi ba <mistake>ste// ma</mistake> ning gi ni go 'phang <mistake>mchog /shes</mistake> <mistake>ra</mistake> rgyu las ma byung <mistake>zhing//shes</mistake> rab rgyu las byung ba <mistake>'bras//shes</mistake> rab rgyu
5: las ma skyes <mistake>phyir//shes</mistake> rab <mistake>la</mistake> skyes rgyu skyes <mistake>min//shes</mistake> rab ye shes bla na <mistake>med//'bras</mistake> bu <mistake>rgya</mistake> yis gzhan dang <mistake>gzhan// phan</mistake> tshun du ni rgyas btab <mistake>med//rgyu</mistake> dang 'bras bu thams cad <mistake>gang//de</mistake> ni
6: <mistake>bten</mistake> cing <mistake>'brel</mistake> par <mistake>'byung// phan</mistake> chun <mistake>rgya</mistake> yis btab pa'i <mistake>gzugs//skye</mistake> min mya <mistake>pan</mistake> 'das <mistake>pa'ng</mistake> <mistake>min//shes</mistake> rab kun nas mya <mistake>dan</mistake> <mistake>'das// skye</mistake> ba mchog tu 'gyur ba <mistake>med//rgyu</mistake> dang 'bras bu rnam <mistake>nges/</mistake>
7: <mistake>grol// bhantshun</mistake> du ni rgyas <mistake>btang</mistake> <mistake>med//ma</mistake> skyes pa dang ma 'gags <mistake>pa'i//shes</mistake> bya gang zhig 'dir mthong <mistake>ba//de</mistake> ni rang sems <mistake>gzha na</mistake> ma <mistake>yin//phyi</mistake> yi shes bya rnam 'byed <mistake>phyir//de</mistake> phyir bdag
8: gis bdag nyid <mistake>la// 'gar</mistake> yang rgyas <mistake>gdb</mistake> nus ma <mistake>yin //ral</mistake> <mistake>gra</mistake> chen po bdag nyid <mistake>la//bdag</mistake> nyid so yis gcod dam <mistake>ci//moshom</mistake> bu mo dang 'grogs <mistake>pas //rmi</mistake> lam du ni bde 'gyur <mistake>ltar//</mistake>
